preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 40 g of iron powder using a digital scale. 
 2. Measure 60 g of mercury carefully, ensuring to minimize exposure. 
 3. Measure 20 g of thulium powder. 
 4. Measure 30 g of yttrium powder. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all measured powders. 
 6. Mix thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer for 10 minutes to ensure uniformity.
